name: Apple Inc.
longBusinessSummary: Apple Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables, and accessories worldwide. The company also sells software, services, and digital content, operating platforms such as iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS, and provides advertising, payment, and cloud offerings. Apple distributes its products through direct channels, its online and retail stores, and a broad network of carriers, retailers, and resellers.
